issue.title: [FCD] nullptr constructors for smart pointers should be constexpr

discussion.p: The unique_ptr and shared_ptr constructors taking nullptr_t delegate to a constexpr constructor, and could be constexpr themselves.
discussion.note: Resolved in Rapperswil by a motion to directly apply the words from the ballot comment in N3102.

resolution.p:
In the synopsis add "constexpr" to unique_ptr(nullptr_t).
In the synopsis add "constexpr" to unique_ptr(nullptr_t).
In the synopsis add "constexpr" to shared_ptr(nullptr_t).
